text: Nuxia glomerulata is a species of plant in the Stilbaceae family. It is endemic to South Africa, where it has a restricted range between Pretoria and Zeerust. It resembles Nuxia congesta but the leaves are more elliptic, leathery and glabrous. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of South Africa Category:Stilbaceae Category:Near threatened plants Category:Flora of the Northern Provinces Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Nuxia glomerulata
